discussionPoints: 70/30 split balances tax efficiency and long-term growth
advisorRecommendation.recommendationText: Hold 70% for diversified portfolio, sell 30% for tax withholding and charitable giving

timelineEvents.title: Q1 Planning with Fred
timelineEvents.description: Review vest strategy, donor-advised fund timing, and tax-loss harvesting opportunities

timelineEvents.title: ESPP Purchase Period Ends
timelineEvents.description: Employee Stock Purchase Plan Q4 2025 purchase executes. 15% discount applied.

timelineEvents.title: Trading Window Opens
timelineEvents.description: Execute pre-approved trades. Window closes Feb 28.

timelineEvents.title: RSU Vest: 3,430 shares
timelineEvents.description: Execute 70/30 split per Fred's recommendation. Coordinate with Maria for DAF transfer.

timelineEvents.title: Trade Modification Deadline
timelineEvents.description: Last day to modify or cancel scheduled vest-day trades

timelineEvents.title: Q1 Blackout Period Begins
timelineEvents.description: Trading restricted until Q1 earnings release (est. April 18)

timelineEvents.title: Q1 Estimated Tax Payment
timelineEvents.description: Federal and CA estimated tax due. Withholding may not cover Feb vest.

timelineEvents.title: RSU Vest: 3,258 shares
timelineEvents.description: Q2 vest. Review market conditions before executing split.

timelineEvents.title: Annual Performance & Equity Grant
timelineEvents.description: Review cycle complete. New RSU grant details available in Equity Center.

timelineEvents.title: ESPP Enrollment Deadline
timelineEvents.description: Enroll or modify Q3/Q4 2026 ESPP contribution (current: 15% of salary)

timelineEvents.title: RSU Vest: 3,773 shares
timelineEvents.description: Q3 vest includes performance multiplier (125% of target)

timelineEvents.title: Q4 Tax Planning with Maria
timelineEvents.description: Year-end tax strategy, charitable giving, and 2027 equity planning
